name: Snips & Snails
description:
Story:

Snips & Snails is an 18+ indie otome featuring four love interests of different supernatural species referred to as the Arcane, or Arcs. Play as a college aged girl figuring out her life while also forming new friendships and relationships with a local Arcane family. Experience the butterfly effect by choosing a different path each time and see how different life becomes due to your choices! The person you fall for can really change your life, in many big ways.

Features:

    *4 Love interest routes with 2 full endings each and one unlockable epilogue
    *Approximately 108,000 words
    *1 Detailed CG per love interest
    *Different sprite expressions and outfits
    *Nameable MC
    *A lovable BFF
    *OPTIONAL Sexual Content
